summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of West Roxbury Street, from 24th Avenue Southwest to the alley east of 26th Avenue Southwest, in conformity with existing grades; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and for the making of the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting on said West Roxbury Street and providing for the payment therefor.
